summary: Play as the Irish in Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
A new playable race for Skyrim! 

Stats: 

+10 Speech (The Gift of Gab) 
+10 Two-Handed (Claymores) 
+ 5 Block 
+ 5 Heavy Armor 
+ 5 Smithing 

=35 (Same as every other race) 

Abilities: 

"Luck of the Irish" -The Irish seem to find more gold where ever the go. 
"Spirit of the Isle - The Irish can summon the Spirit of the Isle to fill their souls with strength 
They also start with +25 in both Health and Stamina 

FAQ: 

Q. Why did the Irish come to Tamirel, let alone Skyrim? 
A. POTATOS 

Please report any bugs!
author: Sean
